[Behaverse Studyflow](https://behaverse.org/data-model/spec/general/studyflows) is a visual language to describe scientific research in a more formal way than texts or static graphics. You can use [Studyflow Modeler](https://behaverse.org/studyflow-modeler) app to create and execute studyflow diagrams.
